IS_STRING_INTEGER: It must be an integer represented as string. e.g. '123'
NOT_EMPTY_ARRAY: It must be an array with at least one element
JSON: It must be a valid json.
DATE: It must be a valid ISO8601 date.
STRING_ENUM: It must be one of the following values: {constraints.1}, you provided: "{value}"
DOESNT_MATCH_FORMAT: It must follow format "{format}". Current value is "{value}"
MAX_INTEGER: It must be a number equal or less than {constraints.0}
URL: It must be a valid URL
UUID_V4: It must be a valid UUID v4
BOOLEAN: It must be a checked or unchecked
PASSWORD_DOESNT_MATCH_CONSTRAINTS: Password should has minimum eight characters, at least one letter, one number and one special character
REPEAT_PASSWORD_DOESNT_MATCH: Repeated password should match the original one, please check it
MAX_STRING_LENGTH: It's too long, must be max {constraints.0} characters
MIN_STRING_LENGTH: It's too short, must be min {constraints.0} characters
ARRAY_MAX_SIZE: It's too long, must be max {constraints.0} elements
ARRAY_MIN_SIZE: It's too short, must be min {constraints.0} elements
